LyTjgQ5B0HEEZoo4.name: Psychic Poison

JYG9X5hQZTFMP8QM.label: Psychic Poison
JYG9X5hQZTFMP8QM.onSave: negates effect or ends effect if already affected

LyTjgQ5B0HEEZoo4.description: Creatures that take psychic damage from your weapon attacks must make a Constitution saving throw against your maneuver DC or be psychically poisoned for one minute. While a creature is poisoned this way, it suffers the poisoned condition and takes 1d4 ongoing poison damage at the beginning of each of its turns. A creature may attempt this save again at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

system.description:
Your psionic capabilities and wilderness skills have combined to make you into a fearsome apex predator. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom score or your Intelligence score increases by +1, to a maximum of 20.
  • While your Psychic Focus is active, you may spend an exertion point to teleport up to 50 feet instead of moving as normal.
  • Creatures that take psychic damage from your weapon attacks must make a Constitution saving throw against your maneuver DC or be psychically poisoned for one minute. While a creature is poisoned this way, it suffers the poisoned condition and takes 1d4 ongoing poison damage at the beginning of each of its turns. A creature may attempt this save again at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
